attributes.action: provide funding through the Health Service, Social Services and Education to support the provision of Free Lipreading for Adults as part of the government programme to "Keep people in their own homes"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: One of the basic needs of older people is to be able to communicate to find out about their needs, with a view to staying independently in their own homes. People with an hearing disability are now having to pay to learn Lipreading which is their main means of Communicating and 60% of those over the age of 60 have a significant hearing loss

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "provide funding through the Health Service, Social Services and Education to support the provision of Free Lipreading for Adults as part of the government programme to "Keep people in their own homes"

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page18033
